original_text: And it came to pass, when he began to reign, as soon as he sat on his throne, that he slew all the house of Baasha: he left him not one that pisseth against a wall, neither of his kinsfolks, nor of his friends.
korean_text: 시므리가 왕이 되어 왕위에 오를 때에 바아사의 온 집안 사람들을 죽이되 남자는 그의 친족이든지 그의 친구든지 한 사람도 남기지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: as soon as he sat on his throne
that he slew all the house of Baasha
he left him not one that pisseth against a wall
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 벽에 소변을 보는 자 한 명도 남기지 않았고
그의 친척 중에서도 한 명도 없었으며
